name: Codeheroes
description:
At Codeheroes we strive to solve your needs, from enterprise system to complex data science solutions and everything in between.
We specialize in the development of complex back-end systems. So far, we have realized projects for the financial services, education, e-commerce and even fashion industries! In addition to this you need to know that we love startups - it’s like an addiction. For real.
We work with technologies like Scala, Akka, Java.
Have an excellent idea? Problem to solve? Drop us a line!
